Stats & skills

In this article i would like to explain my view on the stat and skill system. The stat system was already explained in the Combat section, but ill repeat it again

Statistics

Dexteritiy

Increases run speed and attack speed

Strenght

Increases Damage and is a requirment for wearing warrior type armor

Constitution

Increases Health Points and Defence

Stamina

Increases the run endurance

Agility

Increases Evasion and is a requirment for wearing dodge type armor

Intelligence

Increases Magic Damage and is a requirment for wearing mage type armor

Wisdom

Increases Cast speed and Mana Regeneration

Mental

Increases magic defence and magic resistance

Agility might be replaced by dex in my opinion and archery should use dex and/or str. It should be able to increase these stats (not just by item bonusses) This could be done with each level you gain, but I noticed alot of people liked the no class system in Classes. No class V3 could be that when its calculated you gain a new level you also gain acces to improving these stats. using this, a player is able to increase his stats by 1 every X levels. Or it could only be increased by certain items (eg Tome of Intelligence gives +1 to int stat) these items should be very rare (or only obtained by doing quests) or a monster drop of a strong boss monster (or else rich players will have super high stats in no time). Or make it souldbound (going to write a article about that soon too)


Skills

Just combat gets boring, alot of todays mmorpgs only offer combat. Peragro should be differend. Combat skills:

Mastery with weapons

When a player fights with a certain type of weapon he/she gains xp in this skill

Mastery with Armour? (linght, medium, heavvy)

Slayer (killing certain monsters)

There should be alot of non combat skills like: mining (no explanation needed)

smithing (melting ore and making weapons/armour etc)

Herblore (making potions etc)

Crafting (making things of leather and juwelary

Fishing

Woodcutting

Cooking

job (doing jobs like collect 10 monkey skulls)

Thieving (stealing, disabeling traps/devices etc)

This way players can have a break from fighting, and start making money in other ways. Note: We have to balance this system so players won't be able to make so many items that nothing is bought from the shop anymore.

This was my article about Skills and Statistics thank you for reading
